turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order an Espresso coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what drink did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like to order at Caffè Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any milk in that for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And did you want any sweetener or syrup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You'd like a iced Grande Cafe Americano with 2% milk at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all correct so far?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. And which Starbucks did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order from the Starbucks on 1515 York Avenue, New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It'll be ready at the Starbucks on 1515 York Avenue, New York city in 9 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else I can help with?
